alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Orange County through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Modena to near Montgomery. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Walden, Howells, Montgomery, Scotchtown, Pine Bush, Circleville and Bullville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
